title: Account Transfer duration?
body:
I know it says that Transferring an account can be instant in most places, whilst some say to give it 24 hours. I have purchased the transfer from EUW to EUNE on my Main Account - **Deaxone**. However it keeps on saying to try again in a few minutes or to contact the support. It's been 2 hours.


Was wondering if anyone can shed some light to how long this can sometimes take x)@

replies.body: Same thing is happening to me :(. I opened a ticket already and got no answer. Please help us.
I looked into this for you, but it looks like the transfer was successfully completed.  Is this still an issue?
Still an issue, not done yet :/ I tried logging in, but it hasn't worked at all!

Weird!  And you're logged into the correct region on login screen?  There is a small region selection option just below the login info field.  

In that case, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our account team can take look.  We'll work with you individually to see what the deal is.  See you there!
